title: Resilience of Mega-Satellite Constellations: How Node Failures Impact Inter-Satellite Networking Over Time?
summary: This study investigates the impact of satellite node failures on inter-satellite networking over time, considering the global reach and dynamic nature of mega-satellite constellations.
